entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:18 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
